updates.details: No further reports of Onion AI service problems have been reported over the past hour. The system remains stable at this point.
The DNS provider has resolved the outage affecting Onion AI. All systems are now operational. We will continue monitoring to verify stability.
Balance inquiries and related Onion AI requests may still be intermittently unavailable. We continue to monitor our DNS provider's progress on resolving the issue.
Onion AI is available again but we continue to monitor the situation and updates from our DNS provider.
Began investigating reports of Onion AI service being unavailable. Relates to DNS outage from third-party provider.
